Name: GOD STARFIGHTER
About the game: GOD STARFIGHTER is a unique and innovative fusion of roguelite and puzzle game. Despite being based on a classic arcade experience, it is the quick wits, calculated management and craftiness that will lead you to victory here. Each wave of foes will issue a different challenge to you and you'll have to shape a mighty answer to them from the list of your intricate, mystic and ever-morphing equipment. Features: - 30+ hours of intense roguelite combat - high replayability! - Lots of thinking and scheming required! - Innovative gameplay that is like nothing else you've experienced. - Big tutorial and adjustable difficulty: from challenging to extremely challenging. - Hardcore - prepare to mostly die through the initial hours of the game. - 50+ highly differing Equipment pieces - 5 starship hulls to choose from. - Distinct enemies based on Tarot major arcanas - 22 foes assemble in over a hundred of compositions! - Various Game Modes: roguelite campaign, endless battle, warp nine. - Comedic mini-events with deep choices.
